creator: semprebon@eqsystems.com
text:
Tried to build a project (the jakarta-struts source) that included a <stlye> 
task and got a ClassNotFoundException: 
org.apache.tools.ant.taskdefs.optional.TraXLiaison. Since <style> is listed as 
a core task, it shouldn't depend on having the optional jar file.

Like the documentation on the struts page says, you'll need to download the
optional.jar file to make <style> work, as its implemenation is not included
with the released version.

The struts page only talks about Ant 1.2, but I'll ask them to update it to
include 1.3 as well.
creator: bodewig@apache.org
